title: Dinner with Folkloric Show at Casa Tambo Restaurant
description: Casa Tambo is a unique and comfortable restaurant, where creole cooking is the house speciality, thus creating a singular ambience which combines dance, music and flavours﻿. Casa Tambo restaurant offers a dinner with live shows that mix the main dances from different regions of Peru.
all_descriptions: Casa Tambo is a unique and comfortable restaurant, where creole cooking is the house speciality, thus creating a singular ambience which combines dance, music and flavours﻿. Casa Tambo restaurant offers a dinner with live shows that mix the main dances from different regions of Peru.

Itinerary- Spend an unforgettable evening at Casa Tambo.
- Taste typical Peruvian dishes at dinner.
- Enjoy one of the best touristic show in Lima.
- Learn about Peru culture in a different way.
- Enjoy the flavors, music and colours of the show.

Casa Tambo Restaurant, Jirón de la Unión 1066, Lima 15001, Peru- This activity does not include transfers.
- Casa Tambo Restaurant: Jirón de la Unión 1066, Lima 15001, Perú
End:This activity ends back at the meeting point.

reviews.title: Colonial ambiance, great show and wonderful food!!
reviews.text: Our party of 5 adults had an amazing time at Casa Tambo. The show was so lively and entertaining, and we loved every minute of it. The restaurant itself is truly lovely. The decoration throughout the place took us aback time. Food, don’t get me started!!! Truly amazing, and the staff was very courteous and attentive. Overall, 100% recommend!! Word to the wise, make sure you leave well ahead of time for the 7:30pm show. You will be hitting their peak at rush hour and you could miss your reservation as the restaurant will allow a 10 minute grace period.
